title: Correction
body: Hey, recently i went overseas and unfortunately, i couldn't play LoL over there so i asked a friend to play for me while i was away. He doesn't have very good internet and he kept on disconnecting. I have ended up in the lower priority queue and it isn't my fault, i really don't want to get the punishment for it. Could you please un-do it? Thanks.

replies.body:
First of all it's against the EULA to have someone else play on your account. Secondly, if they do that, you take full responsibility for what they do. If they were afk'ing in games, then *you* will be punished.

This won't be undone.
